meta.label: Email validation via Mailgun API
meta.description:
The recipe takes as input a dataset of contacts, with one email address per row, and verify the validity of the emails addresses.
The validation is done via the Mailgun API. An API key is required (free to get).
Two columns are added in the output dataset: one boolean for email validation, and one containing the JSON answer from the API.

params.name: email_column
params.label: Email (column)
params.description: The dataset must contain one mail per row in a column.
